publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5535 Tricia Marwick: Forth and Tay Road Bridges Tollsâ€”That the Parliament believes that the tolls should be removed from the Forth Road Bridge and the Tay Road Bridge. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Shona Robison*
